name: BioShock 2: Minerva's Den
description:
BioShock 2: Minerva's Den is an action-shooter game developed by Iron Galaxy Studios. It came out on 23-08-2010. 2K Games published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, BioShock 2: Minerva's Den has a score of 82. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
BioShock 2: Minerva's Den is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
